I am a Master of Applied Science student at the ECE Department of University of British Columbia. I am with the Human Communication Technologies Lab supervised by Prof. Sidney Fels and Dr. Gregor Miller. Go to my CV for more detailed information.

Interests

  • 3D computer vision (check out open3DCV)
    • Multi-View Stereo
    • Structure from Motion
    • Photometric Stereo
  • Physics-based Vision
  • Digital Photography
